data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 26344, Version Hash: dd79c191e1c3276e7afc28da7fa1ae2230b60708
data.actual_result: The overlay gets shoved into what looks like a 100x100 pixel box in the top left of the screen
data.expected_result: The overlay should open and display its usual stuff
data.short_description: Overlay goes really small when hooked by OBS game capture in SOMA
data.steps_to_repro: - Start SOMA - Start OBS, make a game capture source and select SOMA - Bug occurs as soon as the game capture finds SOMA
